identified-content.person: Huang, Jenny Xiao Ling (Jenny Xiao Ling Hong)

block.p: Jenny Xiao Ling Huang was married yesterday to Roger Hong. Mark J. Wheeler, a Universal Life minister, officiated at the Bowers Museum of Cultural Art in Santa Ana, Calif.

Mrs. Hong, 26, is a law clerk to Judge Pierre N. Leval of the United States Court of Appeals for the Second Circuit in New York. She graduated magna cum laude from Harvard and received her law degree magna cum laude from New York University. She is a daughter of Jessie and John Y. Huang of Fountain Valley, Calif.
The couple were married Saturday. Mark J. Wheeler, a Universal Life minister, officiated at the Bowers Museum of Cultural Art in Santa Ana, Calif.
Jenny Xiao Ling Huang was married yesterday to Roger Hong. Mark J. Wheeler, a Universal Life minister, officiated at the Bowers Museum of Cultural Art in Santa Ana, Calif.

Mrs. Hong, 26, is a law clerk to Judge Pierre N. Leval of the United States Court of Appeals for the Second Circuit in New York. She graduated magna cum laude from Harvard and received her law degree magna cum laude from New York University. She is a daughter of Jessie and John Y. Huang of Fountain Valley, Calif.

Mr. Hong, 27, is a fourth-year medical student at Weill Medical College of Cornell University in New York. He also graduated magna cum laude from Harvard, where the bride and bridegroom met. He is a son of Deborah and Kenneth Hong of Toronto.
